subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James scored 23 points and Dwyane Wade had 16, leading Miami to a 105-90 rout at Indiana to become the first N.B.A. team in 33 years to win three road games in three days.
snippet: LeBron James scored 23 points and Dwyane Wade had 16, leading Miami to a 105-90 rout at Indiana to become the first N.B.A. team in 33 years to win three road games in three days.
